name: Out of Reach (itch) (ejean673, TheScootz, Monnotone)
description: Out of Reach is a 3D horror survival game where the player is required to navigate a maze-like area that resembles the rafters sometimes found near the ceilings of some buildings. As they do so, they must collect the required items in order to escape. Many narrow paths such as crossbeams must be navigated carefully to avoid falling off, and various other hazards must be dealt with as well.
